description.value: At 15th level, once per day when the order of the songbird samurai confirms a critical hit against the target of her challenge, she can declare it a beautiful strike without spending an action. The damage dealt by the attack becomes nonlethal damage, and the target must succeed at a Will save (DC = 10 + half the samurai’s class level + her Charisma modifier) or be charmed as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.smbkd2yobhshbpqf]{Charm Monster} (caster level equals the samurai’s class level).
